grahampaige.comment:
No, Mrs. Johnson can proceed reading everything unless somebody pulls an item off. OK, thanks. Number six point zero one appointment of clerk vice chairperson. It is recommended that the Albemarle County School Board appoint its officers including chairman vice-chairman and clerk according to Virginia Code Section One Point Eight Zero Seven B Sixteen. Moved by Mr. Alcaro second by Vice Chair Carlson that we nominate Graham Page as chair of the county school board until July First Twenty twenty-three moved by Mr. Del Carro Second By Vice Chairman Colson That Dave Ross Be Nominated As Our New Vice-Chair Until June Thirtieth Two Thousand Three Hundred Seventy-Four Moved by Mr. Alcaro Second By Vice President Carson that Katrina Coulson serve as secretary chief operating officer until thirty-first December Thirty-Two thousand seventy-four. Is There Any Discussion On These Motions If Not Could You Please Call Roll For Each Of Them Starting With A Nomination To Serve As Chair From Mr. Alcaro Second By Vice Chair Carlson In Favor Opposed Hearing None Mr. Koleser Moves Adoption Of This Resolution Appointing Graham Paige As Chair Of The County Public Schools Effective Immediately Upon Passage Of This Motion Through Next Year At Which Time He Will Have Served Four Years Consecutive Terms As Chair Unanimous Approval Recorded
katrinacallsen: Yeah, sorry about that. Sorry about that. Okay, next up nomination of David Rosso nominated as vice president effective January third
